description.english: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Literacy: Common, Literacy: Celestial, Literacy: Draconic, Literacy: Infernal.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Aimed Shot, Multi Shot, Quick Shot, Dark Vision.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Blade Flurry, Deadly Throw, Silent Move, Dual Wield.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Heroic Charge, Crushing Blow, Sweeping Blow, Shield Bash.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing any monster. Note that monsters are visibly larger than your average creature.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 7.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 14.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the secret seventh talent.
This heritage can be unlocked by viewing all tutorial entries.
This heritage can be unlocked by having 11 enchanted items equipped at the same time.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while eating only blood cap mushrooms.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while causing physical damage with fists only.
This heritage can be unlocked by finding three or more hidden magic traps with the search button in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by passing three or more reflex checks in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by visiting the graves of all Heroes of Hallwood.
This heritage can be unlocked by having 20 or more points of fire resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having 20 or more points of frost resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having 20 or more points of shock resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having 15 or more points of poison resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by having 15 or more points of disease resistance at any given time.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning six talents without learning how to read.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Celestial spells in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Draconic spells in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Infernal spells in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all amulet effects in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all ring effects in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all wand effects in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all scroll effects in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all potion effects in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all enchant effects in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a black shirt or robe and defiling graves until you see something purple.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a red shirt or robe and eating some meat.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a green shirt or robe and destroying an item by throwing it to a wall.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a blue shirt or robe and dropping an item while stuck in a water pit.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing an orange shirt or robe and wielding two swords at the same time.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a yellow shirt or robe and flipping a coin until you get three tails in a row.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a pink shirt or robe and saying "I love pink" without the quotes on the chat.
This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a white shirt or robe and using a soul gem until you receive your multipass.
This heritage can be unlocked by obtaining a score of over 9000 after unlocking all eight shirt heritages.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing Gurmur and interrupting the cultists' plan to take over the world.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing a Dread Wolf.
This heritage can be unlocked by taking a look at Woof while it is badly hurt or almost dead.
This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Woof from a pit.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 3.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 6.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 9.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 12.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 15.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a Dire Wolf.
This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a monster.
This challenge can be completed by killing an enemy with a healing potion.
This challenge can be completed by causing 25 or more damage to an enemy with a single shot.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured level 10+ enemy with a single hit from a thrown weapon. Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster while causing damage only with your bare hands.
This challenge can be completed by killing all Heroes of Hallwood in the final battle.

This challenge can be completed by clearing an entire dungeon while having a cursed amulet and two cursed rings equipped. Items must be equipped at the time the dungeon is reset and closing an entrance does not count.
This challenge can be completed by reaching level 20 without lighting any torches.
This challenge can be completed by killing yourself using telekinesis.
This challenge can be completed by completing all other challenges.
This challenge can be completed by enslaving a daemon while having a human, undead, beast and monster friends at the same.
This challenge can be completed by finishing all nine special encounters in a single game.
This challenge can be completed by having 48 or more ability points without buffs or debuffs.
This challenge can be completed by reaching level 10 without killing anyone or anything.
This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after casting Divine Shield while having only one health remaining.
This challenge can be completed by having six unused talent points.
This challenge can be completed by having 2450 gold coins in your backpack.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster with a single blow. Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by looting the crown after dying at least once.
This challenge can be completed by failing a reflex check while having Lightning Reflexes heritage and Sixth Sense talent.
This challenge can be completed by having 20 ability damage effects that reduce all abilities by 5.
This challenge can be completed by killing a creature that has hit you for 25 or more points of damage with a single attack or spell.
This challenge can be completed by learning all Celestial, Draconic and Infernal spells in a single game.
This challenge can be completed by showing your inner rogue and killing your puppy eyed soul mate.
This challenge can be completed by starting the final battle with 8 or more undead friends.
This challenge can be completed by killing five or more enemies with a single melee attack.
This challenge can be completed by equipping a weapon that has ten or more poison effects.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured drake with frozen orbs. Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by obtaining the ring of power.
This challenge can be completed by having ten or more curse effects at the same time.
This challenge can be completed by having twelve or more buff effects at the same time.
This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Artificer Leo Noerde and bringing him back to town.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Talon, Fine Sword, Fine Claw.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Flail, Fine Mace, Fine Hammer.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Mangler, Fine Chopper, Fine Crusher.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Hatchet, Fine Throwing Knife, Fine Throwing Star.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Recurve, Fine Crossbow, Fine Repeater.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Target, Fine Shield, Fine Barrier.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Helm, Fine Studded Helm, Fine Chain Helm, Fine Plate Helm.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Armour, Fine Studded Armour, Fine Chain Armour, Fine Plate Armour.
This heritage can be unlocked by donating four or more unique items to the Artisans' Guild in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents: Shapeshift: Wolf, Shapeshift: Bear, Bestial Wrath.
This heritage can be unlocked by regaining over 666 points of health while shapeshifted and in combat.
This heritage can be unlocked by shapeshifting while having 6 or more beast friends.
This heritage can be unlocked by having a strength modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a bear.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a single hit in bear form at level 20.
This heritage can be unlocked by critically hitting any of the named encounter bosses in bear form.
This heritage can be unlocked by having an agility modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a wolf.
This heritage can be unlocked by eating a dread bat that has leeched life from you while you are in wolf form.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a critical hit in wolf form at level 20.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing 3 monsters and eating their corpses while shapeshifted.
This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after spending 5 or more turns in lava.
This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after being surrounded by 8 dwellers and/or lurkers.
This challenge can be completed by killing 21 enemies in a row without being hit by a melee, ranged or spell attack.
This challenge can be completed by regaining 42 points of health by life draining enemies.

This challenge can be completed by doing the following: store 10000 or more gold coins, spend it all until you have 0 gold, drop all items from your backpack and reset dungeon with 0 gold, store 10000 or more gold coins and type "Everything in life is luck".
This challenge can be completed by by eating the following monsters while polymorphed: Cave Bear, Drake, Floater, Glutopod, Infernal and Mamalob.
This challenge can be completed by killing 66 under aged daemons at level 20 after typing: "I offer my dungeon to you".
This challenge can be completed by finding and resurrecting Ken'nih before his corpse is eaten by rats.
This challenge can be completed by having Woof cause any damage to the King.
This challenge can be completed by looting the crown on heroic difficulty level.
This challenge can be completed by killing Dread Lord Nabon and ending his reign of terror.
This challenge can be completed by making sure that dwarves won't be added in the game anytime soon.
This challenge can be completed by befriending an infernal.
This challenge can be completed by having three permanent drake friends at the same time.
This challenge can be completed by causing at least 25 points of enchanted elemental damage before resistances with a single melee or ranged hit.
This challenge can be completed by viewing your stats while having 22 immunities (press Ctrl in the inventory).
This challenge can be completed by completing the following steps: Reach level 18 or higher, find a Third Leg of the Imp, type "I'm over 9 inches", slay enough trolls.
This challenge can be completed by having a treeman heal four or more other treemen in one turn.
This challenge can be completed by killing a merchant and all his henchmen with giant rats.
This challenge can be completed by slaying a demonrat that is properly triggered.
This challenge can be completed by naming a weapon "Orangutang" and using it to slay 50 swamp monsters.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This challenge is secret and its description is not shown here.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Arcane spells in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Bestial spells in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Abyssal spells in a single game.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Spaulders, Fine Studded Spaulders, Fine Chain Spaulders, Fine Plate Spaulders.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Vambraces, Fine Studded Vambraces, Fine Chain Vambraces, Fine Plate Vambraces.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Gloves, Fine Studded Gloves, Fine Chain Gloves, Fine Plate Gauntlets.
This heritage can be unlocked by crafting the following items in a single game: Fine Leather Boots, Fine Studded Boots, Fine Chain Boots, Fine Plate Sabatons.
This heritage can be unlocked by donating an item from the future to the Artisan's Guild.
This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified horn to the Artisan's Guild.
This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified pyramidion to the Artisan's Guild.
This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Wise' after finishing the test of leadership.
This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Just' after finishing the test of leadership.
This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Decent' after finishing the test of leadership.
This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Kind' after finishing the test of leadership.
This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Cruel' after finishing the test of leadership.
This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Fair' after finishing the test of leadership.
This challenge can be completed by being known as 'the Gentle' after finishing the test of leadership.
This challenge can be completed by reseting a dungeon after meeting three angry pops.
This challenge can be completed by merging your old Epixx.org achievements to Steam and deleting them from the server by using /presteam command.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing Balthar the Familiar.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing Ch'Ri the Blingstealer.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing Skaldir the Timeless.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of spaulders in one of your stash boxes.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of vambraces in one of your stash boxes.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of gloves in one of your stash boxes.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 16 different kinds of boots in one of your stash boxes.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of amulets in one of your stash boxes.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of rings in one of your stash boxes.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of charms in one of your stash boxes.
This heritage can be unlocked by storing 30 different kinds of runes in one of your stash boxes.
This challenge can be completed by killing Balthar the Familiar while wearing Ring of Anxiety.
This challenge can be completed by finding out the exploitable weakness of Ch'Ri the Blingstealer.
This challenge can be completed by killing Ch'Ri the Blingstealer without haste effects or exploits and without being poisoned.
This challenge can be completed by finding out the exploitable weakness of Skaldir the Timeless.
This challenge can be completed by killing Skaldir the Timeless without haste effects or exploits.
This challenge can be completed by killing Skaldir the Timeless twice in a single game.
This challenge can be completed by completing all collector heritages in any number of games.
This challenge can be completed by killing Boarstone with the gift crossbow and Slow and Steady talent.
This legendary effect can be imbued by killing Ch'Ri the Blingstealer (only works with a club or fine club).
This challenge can be completed by killing the King with a Bloody Club.
This challenge can be completed by performing a binding ritual described in the grimoire.

This heritage can be unlocked by doing the following: Contract a dungeon fever from a bear trap, spike trap or spiked pit. Visit Shrine of Fubar and donate 100 gold coins or more to remove all illnesses.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing a dingbat that goes by the name Bierkoff.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing 42 or more bats in dingbat form (bat swarms count as 9).
This heritage can be unlocked by eating a floater in dingbat form.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing an earth elemental in dingbat form.
This heritage can be unlocked by having a charisma modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a dingbat.
This challenge can be completed by killing Gurmur before reaching level 20 but after gaining 6 levels by drinking Cowrain Extra.

This challenge can be unlocked by doing the following: Shapeshift into dingbat form before or during the undead phase in the final battle. Do not shapeshift back into human form before the crown has dropped on the floor.
This heritage can be unlocked by ordering Woof 88 times while hidden and using Sign Language talent.
This heritage can be unlocked by defeating the training dummy at the Outcast's Refuge.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 10 in the Tragical Gathering game.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 20 in the Tragical Gathering game.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 30 in the Tragical Gathering game.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 40 in the Tragical Gathering game.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 50 in the Tragical Gathering game.
This heritage can be unlocked by reaching tragedy level 25 using a premade deck.
This heritage can be unlocked by playing a certain legendary card.
This heritage can be unlocked by killing Bebe le Frog and some Hooklers that hang around her.
This heritage can be unlocked by collecting the first 250 cards in your tragical album.
